original_text: Then Peter said, ‘All of God's prophets spoke about Jesus as God's Messiah. They said that God would forgive everyone who believes in him. He would forgive them for their sins because of what Jesus, the Messiah, would do.’
korean_text: 그에 대하여 모든 선지자도 증언하되 그를 믿는 사람들이 다 그의 이름을 힘입어 죄 사함을 받는다 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: All of God's prophets spoke about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 모든 선지자들이 예수에 대해 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: They said that God would forgive everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하나님께서 모든 사람을 용서하실 것이라고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: He would forgive them for their sins
because of what Jesus, the Messiah, would do
